name: Percy Brown
description: ,Am a widow with one son.Last four years,i lose my wife in motor accident.Since then i have not find a lady i admire…I was born in Nevada,obtained my degree in the University of South Carolina,and recently live in California,I find very much peace and tranquility there..I`m 5`7″ 140 with a athletic build,mentally stable,physically fit,a bunch of laughs, warm, caring, honest, good listening, God Fearing, and a positive person
